title: Pho
ingredients: ['2.25kg beef knuckle, with meat', '1kg beef oxtail', '1 white radish (aka daikon or mooli), sliced', '2 onions, chopped', '50g whole star anise pods', '1/2 cinnamon stick', '2 whole cloves', '1 teaspoon black peppercorns', '1 slice fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '675g dried flat rice noodles', '225g frozen beef sirloin', 'Toppings', 'sriracha hot sauce', 'hoisin sauce', '1 thinly sliced onion', '1 bunch fresh coriander', '200g bean sprouts', '1 bunch sweet Thai basil', '1/2 bunch spring onion, thinly sliced', '2 limes, quartered']
